DataElement.preferredName: Non-Target or New Lesion Response Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the kind of response of non target or new Lesion.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized._Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Non-Target Lesion Identification Or New Lesion Identification
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized.

Concepts.definition: The identification of a lesion that is not considered a target lesion but may be affected by the therapeutic intervention.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized.

Property.preferredDefinition: Response is any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

Concepts.definition: Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: Princess Margaret Cancer Centre, Toronto, ON
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 9/18/17 LS created for Princess Margaret response list.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Non-Target Or New Lesion  Response Type
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: T_Other than the one for which something is done._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized._Any act or phenomena, or behavior, constituting a reply or reaction of a living organism or its part to some foregoing stimulus or agent._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An overall level of substantial worsening in non-target disease that is of a magnitude that, even in the presence of SD or PR in target disease, the treating physician would feel it important to change therapy. (RECIST)

Concepts.definition: An overall level of substantial worsening in non-target disease that is of a magnitude that, even in the presence of SD or PR in target disease, the treating physician would feel it important to change therapy. (RECIST)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2023.8.15 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0002731. ak

Concepts.definition: Unable to be evaluated.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.: Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Concepts.definition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.: A process of becoming larger, more numerous, more important, or more likely.: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.: Occurring prior to something else.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
A process of becoming larger, more numerous, more important, or more likely.
Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
Occurring prior to something else.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.: The non-affirmative response to a question.: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.: Occurring prior to something else.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
Occurring prior to something else.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

Concepts.definition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
